data.name: Augment Code
data.description: Stealth-mode autonomous coding agent with 200K token context windows and 65.4% SWE-bench performance. Emerged from stealth with $227M Series B funding.
data.tagline: Large context autonomous coding with Series B backing

data.name: OpenAI Codex CLI
data.description: Open-source CLI tool powered by OpenAI's o3 reasoning model. Features autonomous software engineering capabilities with Docker integration for local development workflows.
data.tagline: Open-source autonomous coding with o3 reasoning

data.name: Windsurf
data.description: AI-powered IDE assistant acquired by OpenAI for $3 billion in April 2025. Previously known as Codeium's flagship product.
